categoryBlurb: New parents with a newborn baby are often sleep deprived and busy - give them a gift of comforting healthy delicious meals, together. Lish gives them convenient access to delicious, wholesome meals prepared fresh by top local chefs, including alums from The French Laundry and Canlis. Their daily rotating menu always includes gluten free and vegan options.  Lish is offering a subscription program that will be $400 for 32 individual meals, or one month of delicious food made for new parents.

productList.productName: Lish: Chef-made meals for New Parents - A week of dinners for 2
productList.productDescription: We know you're busy. Lish gives you convenient access to delicious, wholesome meals prepared fresh by top local chefs, including alums from The French Laundry and Canlis. Our daily rotating menu always includes gluten free and vegan options.  Lish is offering a subscription program that will be $100 a week for 8 individual meals made for new parents.  This makes a great gift to give together.
